mapper.select: SELECT a.*, m.name FROM approval a JOIN member m ON a.currmember_no = m.member_no WHERE a.document_state != 3 AND a.draftmember_no = #{param1}

SELECT a.*, m.name FROM approval a JOIN member m ON a.draftmember_no = m.member_no JOIN approver ap ON a.approval_no = ap.approval_no WHERE a.document_state != 3 AND ap.sortation = 0 AND ap.member_no = #{param1}

SELECT a.*, m.name FROM approval a JOIN member m ON a.draftmember_no = m.member_no JOIN approver ap ON a.approval_no = ap.approval_no WHERE a.document_state != 3 AND ap.sortation = 1 AND ap.member_no = #{param1}
SELECT a.*, d.depart_name, m.name, m.member_position FROM approval a JOIN member m ON a.draftmember_no = m.member_no JOIN department d ON m.depart_no = d.depart_no WHERE a.approval_no = #{param1}
SELECT file_oriname, file_newname FROM file WHERE file_unique_no=#{param1} and file_location = "a"

SELECT m.member_position, m.name, ap.approval_order, a.approval_state, ah.processing_result, ah.reason, ah.processing_date, d.depart_name FROM approval a JOIN approver ap ON a.approval_no = ap.approval_no JOIN member m ON ap.member_no = m.member_no JOIN department d ON m.depart_no = d.depart_no LEFT JOIN approval_history ah ON ap.approver_no = ah.approver_no WHERE ap.sortation = 0 AND a.approval_no = #{param1}

SELECT m.member_position, m.name, ap.approval_order, a.approval_state, ah.processing_result, ah.reason, ah.processing_date, d.depart_name FROM approval a JOIN approver ap ON a.approval_no = ap.approval_no JOIN member m ON ap.member_no = m.member_no JOIN department d ON m.depart_no = d.depart_no LEFT JOIN approval_history ah ON ap.approver_no = ah.approver_no WHERE ap.sortation = 1 AND a.approval_no = #{param1}
SELECT ap.sortation FROM approver ap JOIN member m ON ap.member_no = m.member_no JOIN approval a ON a.approval_no = ap.approval_no WHERE m.member_no = #{param2} AND a.approval_no = #{param1}

SELECT ap.approval_order FROM approver ap JOIN member m ON ap.member_no = m.member_no JOIN approval a ON a.approval_no = ap.approval_no WHERE ap.sortation = 0 AND m.member_no = #{param2} AND a.approval_no = #{param1}
SELECT approver_no fROM approver a WHERE member_no = #{param1} AND approval_no = #{param2}
